name: Fate of the Fell
flavorText: "When the unholy creature stalking Harstead was finally slain, the town's clergy commissioned the construction of this massive weapon. Adorned with a weight fashioned in the fiend’s terrible visage, the flail was meant to serve as a warning to any fell invader." —Rennold's Catalogue of Arms
flavorTextHtml: "When the unholy creature stalking Harstead was finally slain, the town's clergy commissioned the construction of this massive weapon. Adorned with a weight fashioned in the fiend’s terrible visage, the flail was meant to serve as a warning to any fell invader." —Rennold's Catalogue of Arms

secondary.textHtml: Heaven's Fury gains two additional rays and has its damage increased by 473%. (Crusader Only) [375 - 500]%
